New Records: James Harden passed Kevin Garnett on the NBA's all-time three-point list during the Clippers vs. Kings game on November 9, 2024.
Key Match Events: James Harden finished the game with 22 points, 8 assists, 4 rebounds, and 2 steals despite shooting 5/16 from the field and committing 7 turnovers.
Pre-Game Insights: The LA Clippers aimed to extend their undefeated road record and achieve a three-game winning streak, which they accomplished with their victory over the Sacramento Kings.
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers' three-game winning streak and road dominance were highlighted as significant achievements following their victory against the Sacramento Kings.
